name: feathers-swagger
description: Add documentation to your Feathers services and feed them to Swagger UI.

scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag pre
scripts.release:premajor: npm version premajor && npm publish --tag pre
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add docs/CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "chore: Update changelog"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run test:types
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run test:types && npm run coverage:ci
scripts.test:ci:cleanup: git reset HEAD package.json package-lock.json && npm ci
scripts.coverage:ci: npm run coverage:ci:v5 && npm run coverage:ci:v4 && nyc report
scripts.coverage:ci:v4: npm run coverage:ci:v4:install && npm run coverage:ci:v4:nyc
scripts.coverage:ci:v4:install: npm rm @feathersjs/koa @koa/router koa-mount koa-static && npm install @feathersjs/feathers@^4 @feathersjs/express@^4
